Author: livipup
Text: I at least made a decision when I grabbed a soda from the fridge to take the medicine I have for before meals instead of reheating the cold coffee I left out from this morning ðŸ˜ž

Author: weegey
Text: I used to have horrible anxiety about this sort of thing.  I still sort of do.  I convinced myself that I had no will power, and that I was "losing control".  The reality is that it is okay and normal to say yes to food that sounds good to you.  It is normal to eat a reasonable amount of food so it doesn't go to waste.  It is normal to have unplanned meals/snacks, and it is normal to sometimes eat more than just the bare minimum to fuel your body.  I know it's hard, but you are doing the right thing by saying yes to food.    You might be "losing control" in the eyes of your disorder, but you are gaining control over the rest of your life.
